name: Flop to the Top
description:
Jump from puddle to puddle to reach the top of the island. 

Contains 10 levels and a bonus level, that can be unlocked if the player completes the game with less than 75 flops.

  • Hold left click to charge the jump. Release left click to jump in the direction you're looking at.
  • Hold right click to have a bird-eye view of the level.
  • R to restart the level

Antoine Fion | Konstantin Loffler | Marc Vassallucci | Jeffrey Vermeer

All code and assets were created during the duration of this jam with the following exceptions:

"Fredoka_One" Font

Cheer audio from freesound.org
https://freesound.org/
